definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: This article discusses the international legal liability for transboundary environmental damages.
sentences.chinese: 本文對跨界環境損害中的國際法律責任進行論述。

sentences.english: If an expert intentionally makes a false verification, he shall assume legal responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 鑑定人故意作虛假鑑定的，應當承擔法律責任。

sentences.english: Became the domain name registration organization does not undertake the domain name to dispute generally causes legal liability.
sentences.chinese: 域名註冊機構一般不承擔因域名爭議引起的法律責任。

sentences.english: The arbitrator legal liability system has deep rationale.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁員法律責任制度具有深厚的理論基礎。

sentences.english: Finally, legal responsibility for tort of portraiture right has been confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，文章明確了侵害肖像權的法律責任。

sentences.english: When you’re married, you’re liable to have babies, you know.
sentences.chinese: 當你們結婚，你就要對孩子負法律責任，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Moreover, the Event promoter reserves the right to pursue relevant legal responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 賽事主辦推廣方保留進一步追究其法律責任的權利。

sentences.english: Because the domain name registration organization does not undertake the domain name to dispute generally causes legal liability.
sentences.chinese: 域名註冊機構一般不承擔因域名爭議引起的法律責任。

sentences.english: Part V of the non-operating public facilities management liability study.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分是對非經營性公共設施管理法律責任的研究。

sentences.english: The customer is liable for breakages.
sentences.chinese: 顧客對破損承擔法律責任。

sentences.english: One is liable for dolus resulting in damages.
sentences.chinese: 一個人要對惡意欺詐造成的損害負法律責任。

sentences.english: HKJMA is merely a service provider and do not assume or be implied with any legal responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 商會僅爲服務提供者並不承擔任或隠喻何法律責任。

sentences.english: To be in charge of tracing legal responsibility of violator and paying the administrative punishment.
sentences.chinese: 負責對違法者追究法律責任，依法給予行政處罰。

sentences.english: Provided that nothing herein shall relieve the agent from liability to prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 但本條的規定，並不寬免該代理人受檢控的法律責任。

sentences.english: Scotland Yard is already considering whether the company has broken the law.
sentences.chinese: 此外倫敦警察廳也考慮是否追究谷歌公司的法律責任。

sentences.english: Retailers and Brand Owners have a legal responsibility for their brands.
sentences.chinese: 零售商和品牌擁有者對他們的品牌付有法律責任。

definition: to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
to discipline sb/to punish/disciplinary action/to deal with (a matter)/CL:個|个[ge4]
